title: Three Keys and no chests... Riot why?
body: Okay so I've been playing a lot of games and i play with my friends who get a lot of -S and upwards and by some black magic i have more keys than chests... yeah i know i don't get many S's but c'mon really? Riot why? does anyone else have this problem?.... is the chest drop system broken? idk but  this is starting to get rediculous {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: The drop chance is either 0% or 100% in all situations if im correct, you either get an S (- and +) and you get a box, or you don't get a chest either because you don't own the champ, already gotten a box recently on that champ or you have gotten all the boxes you can for that period of time
I have too many chests and not enough keys. #1KEYINSTEADOFFRAGMENT

> [{quoted}](name=Epixragequit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r37yMRWL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-25T03:59:58.852+0000)
>
> I have too many chests and not enough keys. #1KEYINSTEADOFFRAGMENT

Tell me about it, 5 chests and 0 keys (no fragments too)

I had 6 chests and 2 key fragments.
For some reason I had a lucky streak and then got a whole ton of keys and unlocked some and now I only have 1 :D

You can only get a chest once per champ (that you get an S- or better on) per season, so it will just get harder to earn chests as the season goes on. Just wait until next season when people will be flooded with chests and complain about not having enough keys.
